channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- SVG Native Viewer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- SVG Native Viewer

item.title: CVE-2021-39823|2024-08-04T02:20:33.691Z -- adobe -- svg%20native%20viewer
item.description: Adobe svg-native-viewer 8182d14dfad5d1e10f53ed830328d7d9a3cfa96d and earlier versions are affected by a heap buffer overflow vulnerability due to insecure handling of a malicious .svg file, potentially resulting in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. User interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability.
